articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Destiny 2’s Act 2 Content Delivers, Its Focusing Timegate Does Not - Forbes
articles.description: Destiny 2 launched Act 2 yesterday, and I was very impressed with the breadth of content it delivered. However, its weapon focusing timegate is deeply annoying.
articles.content:
Destiny 2
Bungie
